## UserTargetingParams type

UserTargetingParams

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type UserTargetingParams = {
    readonly usernames?: string[];
    readonly profiles?: string[];
    readonly permissions?: string[];
};
```

## Example


```json
{
   "usernames": ["JohnDoe"],
   "profiles": ["ADMIN", "READ_WRITE_DEALER"],
   "permissions": ["ExportClientDashboard"]
}
```
